projects.name: ML from Scratch
projects.description: A set of Machine Learning Projects developer from scratch. Serves as a Portfolio project.

projects.name: XRay Pneumonia Detection GUI
projects.description: A GUI application that detects pneumonia from XRay images using a Convolutional Neural Network.

projects.name: Wake Word Detection
projects.description: A wake word detection system that uses LSTM and Residual blocks to detect the wake word 'Hey Kocho'.

projects.name: Zabbix Graphs Bottleneck Classification
projects.description: A project that classifies bottlenecks in Zabbix graphs using Machine Learning.

projects.name: IPTV Channels Monitoring
projects.description: Python script built using FastAPI and VLC media player that enables monitoring and tracking of IPTV channels' activity and statistics.

projects.name: Basis Vector Encoding
projects.description: This project demonstrates encoding and decoding messages using basis vectors.
